fastTurnarounds.title: Fast Turnarounds
fastTurnarounds.description: Stage photos in about 8 seconds so you can list sooner and finish more deals.

whatIsVirtualStaging.question: What is virtual staging?
whatIsVirtualStaging.answer: Virtual staging is the process of digitally furnishing a property photo to showcase its potential, helping buyers envision how a space can look and feel when fully styled. Unlike traditional staging, it's faster, more cost-effective, and allows for multiple design options tailored to different buyer preferences. With high-quality visuals, virtual staging highlights the property's best features, making it easier for buyers to connect emotionally and imagine themselves living there.

howLong.question: How long does it take?
howLong.answer: On average, virtual staging takes around 8 seconds per photo to process, though the exact time can be a little shorter or longer depending on the complexity of the space and the design style chosen. The result is a quick, seamless transformation that makes your property photos stand out.

customTheme.question: How do I select a custom theme?
customTheme.answer: If you don't see the theme you want, you can select "Custom" and then add a specific prompt for the theme you want. We'll use your prompt to generate the theme you want.

idealRoom.question: What makes an ideal room for staging?
idealRoom.answer: An ideal room for staging should have good lighting, clear walls, and minimal clutter. Empty or sparsely furnished rooms work best, as they provide a clean canvas for the AI to add furniture and decor that matches your chosen style.

privacy.question: Is my data private and secure?
privacy.answer: Yes, we take your privacy seriously. Your uploaded images are processed securely and are not stored permanently on our servers. We use industry-standard encryption and do not share your data with third parties.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out individually or contact us at team@stagify.ai.
contact.social: Follow us on TikTok@stagify.ai or on Instagram@stagify.ai for updates and examples!
